Entries.{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}: {{Random:Rain rain go away~$h, Down came the rain and washed poor Incy out~$h, Doctor Foster went to Gloucester...$h#$b#...In a shower of rain!$h, It's raining~~It's pouring~~$h}}
{{Random:Chuva chuva vá embora~$h, Entrou um pouco de água pela porta~$h, Fecha a janela...$h#$b#...Está chovendo!$h, Está chovendo~~Está alagando~~$h}}
{{Random:唱歌''小雨小雨快快走~$h, 唱歌''雨滴落下，可怜的蜘蛛被冲走了。~$h, 斯特医生去了格洛斯特...$h#$b#...一场雨$h, 下雨啦，哗啦啦~$h}}

Entries.Fri: %How's school, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}? #$b#{{Random:It was okay..., I don't want to go to school anymore...$s, Miss Penny gave me a gold star!$h, It was really fun!$h, I played with Jas lots! She's my bestest friend.$h, I played with Vincent lots! He's my bestest friend.$h, I learnt lots and lots and Miss Penny said I was super smart!$h}}

%Na escola, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}? #$b#{{Random:Estava legal..., Eu não quero mais ir para a escola...$s, A senhora Penny me dava estrelas de ouro!$h, Era realmente divertido!$h, Eu brinquei muito com Jas! Ela é minha melhor amiga.$h, eu brinquei muito com Vincent! Ele é meu melhor amigo.$h, Eu aprendi muito com a senhora Penny, ela disse que eu sou inteligente!$h}}
%{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}，学校怎么样？#$b#{{Random:没关系..., 我不想再上学了...$s, 潘妮小姐给了我一颗金色奖励星星！$h, 真的很好玩！$h, 我和贾斯一起玩，她是我最好的朋友$h, 我和文森特一起玩，他是我最好的朋友$h, 我学到了很多东西，潘妮小姐说我很聪明！$h}}

Entries.Sun: Can we have {{Random:omelets, pancakes, chocolate cake, ice cream, stir fry, fruit salad, crab cakes, shrimp cocktail, sashimi, hashbrowns, bean hot pot, spaghetti, pumpkin soup, burgers}} for dinner tonight?$4

I want {{Random:chocolate cake, ice cream, stir fry, fruit salad, crab cakes, shrimp cocktail, sashimi, hashbrowns, bean hot pot, spaghetti, pumpkin soup, burgers, omelets, pancakes}} for dinner tonight!$h

Eu quero {{Random:omeletse, panquecas, bolo de chocolate, sorvete, batata frita, salada de fruta, bolinho de carangueijo, cocktail, sashimi, brownie, feijão, espaguete, sopa de abóbora, hamburguer}} para o jantar hoje á noite!
我想要{{Random:煎蛋卷, 煎饼, 巧克力蛋糕, 冰淇淋, 炒菜, 水果沙拉, 蟹饼, 虾鸡尾酒, 生鱼片, 土豆煎饼, 豆类火锅, 意大利面, 南瓜汤, 救生汉堡}}当作今晚的晚餐！

Entries.Wed: Miss Penny says we're going to {{Random:learn about dinosaurs, learn about planets, learn about stars, learn about flowers, learn about animals, make macaroni pictures, do origami, do writing practice, read stories |key=school}} today!$h

Sinto falta da Penny dizendo que íamos {{Random:aprender sobre dinossauros, aprender sobre planetas, aprender sobre estrelas, aprender sobre flores, aprender sobre animais, fazer desenhos de macarrão, fazer origami, praticar escrever, ler histórias |key=school}} hoje!$h
潘妮小姐说，今天我们将{{Random:学习恐龙相关的知识, 学习小行星, 了解恒星, 了解花卉, 了解可爱的动物们, 制作通心粉照片, 做折纸, 写练习, 阅读精彩的故事 |key=school}} $h

Entries.{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondChildName}}: {{Random:Down came the rain and washed poor Incy out~$h, Doctor Foster went to Gloucester...$h#$b#...In a shower of rain!$h, It's raining~~It's pouring~~$h, Rain rain go away~$h}}
{{Random:Entrou um pouco de água pela porta~$h, Fecha a janela...$h#$b#...Está chovendo!$h, Está chovendo~~Está alagando~~$h, Chuva chuva vá embora~$h}}
{{Random:唱歌''雨滴落下，可怜的蜘蛛被冲走了。~$h, 斯特医生去了格洛斯特...$h#$b#...一场雨$h, 下雨啦，哗啦啦~$h, 唱歌''小雨小雨快快走~$h}}

Entries.Fri: %How's school, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondChildName}}? #$b#{{Random:I don't want to go to school anymore...$s, Miss Penny gave me a gold star!$h, It was really fun!$h, I played with Jas lots! She's my bestest friend.$h, I played with Vincent lots! He's my bestest friend.$h, I learnt lots and lots and Miss Penny said I was super smart!$h, It was okay...}}

%Na escola, {{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/SecondChildName}}? #$b#{{Random:Eu não quero mais ir para a escola...$s, A senhora Penny me dava estrelas de ouro!$h, Era realmente divertido!$h, Eu brinquei muito com Jas! Ela é minha melhor amiga.$h, eu brinquei muito com Vincent! Ele é meu melhor amigo.$h, Eu aprendi muito com a senhora Penny, ela disse que eu sou inteligente!$h, Estava legal...}}
%{{Loe2run.ChildToNPC/FirstChildName}}，学校怎么样？#$b#{{Random:我不想再上学了...$s, 潘妮小姐给了我一颗金色奖励星星！$h, 真的很好玩！$h, 我和贾斯一起玩，她是我最好的朋友$h, 我和文森特一起玩，他是我最好的朋友$h, 我学到了很多东西，潘妮小姐说我很聪明！$h, 没关系...}}

Entries.Sun: I want {{Random:burgers, omelets, pancakes, chocolate cake, ice cream, stir fry, fruit salad, crab cakes, shrimp cocktail, sashimi, hashbrowns, bean hot pot, spaghetti, pumpkin soup}} for dinner tonight!

Can we have {{Random:burgers, omelets, pancakes, chocolate cake, ice cream, stir fry, fruit salad, crab cakes, shrimp cocktail, sashimi, hashbrowns, bean hot pot, spaghetti, pumpkin soup}} for dinner tonight?$4

Eu quero {{Random:omeletse, panquecas, bolo de chocolate, sorvete, batata frita, salada de fruta, bolinho de carangueijo, cocktail, sashimi, brownie, feijão, espaguete, sopa de abóbora, hamburguer}} para o jantar hoje á noite!
我想要{{Random:煎蛋卷, 煎饼, 巧克力蛋糕, 冰淇淋, 炒菜, 水果沙拉, 蟹饼, 虾鸡尾酒, 生鱼片, 土豆煎饼, 豆类火锅, 意大利面, 南瓜汤, 救生汉堡}}当作今晚的晚餐！
